books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The author of “The Big Short” and “The Premonition” chronicles the rise and fall of Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX.
books.name: GOING INFINITE

books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The Fox News host and author of “American Marxism” argues for the defeat of the Democratic Party.
books.name: THE DEMOCRAT PARTY HATES AMERICA

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The 13th book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series gives a portrayal of the events of 1692 and 1693 in Salem Village, Mass.
books.name: KILLING THE WITCHES

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: The author of “The Code Breaker” traces Musk’s life and summarizes his work on electric vehicles, private space exploration and artificial intelligence.
books.name: ELON MUSK

books.author: by Cassidy Hutchinson
books.description: The former special assistant to President Trump and his chief of staff, Mark Meadows, details events surrounding the crisis of conscience she faced.
books.name: ENOUGH

books.author: by Patrick Stewart
books.description: The Olivier Award-winning actor recounts his classical theater training and onscreen portrayals of the iconic roles of Jean-Luc Picard and Professor Charles Xavier.
books.name: MAKING IT SO

books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Katherine Howe
books.description: The authors of “Vanderbilt” chronicle the Astor family’s place in American society from 1793 through 2009.
books.name: ASTOR

books.author: by Heather Cox Richardson
books.description: The historian and author of the newsletter “Letters From an American” shares her views on the current political moment.
books.name: DEMOCRACY AWAKENING

books.author: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
books.name: OUTLIVE

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Kerry Washington
books.description: The Emmy Award-winning actor describes setbacks she faced and her journey to find a sense of belonging.
books.name: THICKER THAN WATER

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events.
books.name: THE WAGER

books.author: by Steve Inskeep
books.description: A host of NPR’s “Morning Edition” describes encounters Abraham Lincoln had with some who disagreed with him.
books.name: DIFFER WE MUST

books.author: by Cat Bohannon
books.description: A look at human evolution that examines key questions about the female body.
books.name: EVE
